message:
I used the class NotifyTaskCompletion from the AsyncEx library in my project and it works nicely.  
However I ran into the issue that I had to notify an extra PropertyChanged after the Task completed and the Result was set in MyProperty.  
I.e. another property of the viewmodel (not MyProperty).  
I could only get it to work to pass on the delegate of my raisePropertyChanged and my property-name to class NotifyTaskCompletion.
